name: Interactive Photo Composition
description: Create visually compelling photographs by experimenting with different compositions.

input_config.prompt: Generates design concepts, Keep the {{object}} {{file_url}} of the photo intact, create a new photo based on the following factors {{background}} {{foreground}} {{composition}} {{style}}

style.title: Style
style.description: This defines the overall aesthetic of the photo

ui_metadata.value: Realistic with a touch of painterly quality.

background.title: Background
background.description: The environment where the object will be placed

ui_metadata.value: A lush green mountain range with snow-capped peaks under a clear blue sky with wispy clouds.

foreground.title: Foreground Elements
foreground.description: Additional elements that can add depth and interest to the composition

ui_metadata.value: A small wooden cabin with smoke rising from the chimney. A hiker standing on a rocky outcrop, admiring the view (user upload of a specific person optional).

composition.title: Composition
composition.description: Arranging the elements within the frame

ui_metadata.value: Apply the rule of thirds for both the background and foreground elements. Use the winding path leading up the mountainside as a leading line drawing the viewer's eye towards the cabin. Position the hiker slightly off-center to the right, looking towards the left side of the frame (opposite the mountains).
